alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lauderdale County through 130 PM CST... At 100 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Underwood-Petersville, or near Florence, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Killen, Lexington, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville, Anderson, Green Hill, Zip City, Kingtown and Whitehead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
